title: Collateral Command Distribution Instruction File Schema
description: Collateral Command Distribution Instruction File Schema

transactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Clearing member identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountIdentificationId.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

distributionSide.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalDistributionSideCode

securitiesDistributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral

securitiesCollateralIdentification.description: Securities collateral identification as known by party

securitiesAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the securities collateral deposit

securitiesQuantity.description: Quantity requested to securities distribution with command

cashDistributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral

cashCollateralIdentification.description: Cash collateral identification as known by party

cashAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the cash collateral deposit

cashOperationValueAmount.description: Amount requested to cash distribution with command

cashOperationValueCurrency.description: Currency code for cash operation value
cashOperationValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

federalBondsDistributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral

federalBondsCollateralIdentification.description: Federal bonds collateral identification as known by party

federalBondsAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the federal bonds collateral deposit

federalBondsQuantity.description: Quantity requested to federal bonds distribution with command

externalDistributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral

externalCollateralIdentification.description: External collateral identification as known by party

externalAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the external collateral deposit

externalQuantity.description: Quantity requested to external distribution with command
